Record.ClassificationPath: Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Disease or Disorder/Disorder by Site/Respiratory and Thoracic Disorder/Thoracic Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Thoracic Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Heart Disorder/Arrhythmia/Ventricular Arrhythmia/Ventricular Couplet
Record.Description: Two sequential ventricular premature complexes. An otherwise normal finding, but possibly indicative of electrical heart disease particularly in comparison with a single ventricular premature complexes.
